features: INNOVATIVE COMPLEXION BOOSTER: Achieve a flawless glow with the only filter you’ll ever need. This makeup-skincare hybrid works to enhance the overall look of your skin for a glowing, dewy complexion.
CREATES A RADIANT COMPLEXION: The e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter creates a healthy-looking, more radiant complexion.
INFUSED WITH HYALURONIC ACID: Made with Hyaluronic Acid, which hydrates skin, Squalane, which moisturizes skin, and Finely Milled Powders, which blurs lines and pores for a smoother, soft-focus look.

MULTI-USE: Wear on its own, under, or over makeup, mix in with your favorite foundation for a fresh, dewy finish, or use as a highlighter to illuminate the high points of your face. Available in 8 shades that work beautifully across all skin tones.
SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan
body.description: What is it: A full size multi-purpose, liquid glow booster infused with skin-loving ingredients to give your complexion a soft-focus social filter effect IRL. Why you'll love it: Skincare-makeup hybrid for glowing, dewy skin Complexion looks healthy and more radiant Can be used 4 ways: wear alone, over or under makeup, mix with foundation or use as highlighter Enriched with skin-loving ingredients like Squalane and Hyaluronic Acid Available in 8 universal shades that work across all skin tones Key ingredients: Squalane - Moisturizes skin Hyaluronic Acid - Hydrates skin Finely Milled Powders - Blurs lines and pores for a smoother, soft-focus look Great for: All skin types (dry, normal/combo, oily) Achieve a flawless glow with the only filter you’ll ever need. This innovative complexion booster and skincare-makeup hybrid is infused with skin-loving squalane and hyaluronic acid that work to enhance the overall look of skin while rendering a soft-focus, effortless radiance. Wear on its own, under, or over makeup, mix in with your favorite foundation for a fresh, dewy finish, or use as a highlighter to illuminate the high points of your face. Available in 8 flexible shades that work beautifully across all skin tones. All e.l.f. products are free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan and triclocarban. Proud to be 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and Leaping Bunny Certified. Because kindness is chic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Radiant Glowing Review: Lightweight, Sheer Glow, Perfect for everyday
reviews.reviewText: The e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter is a game-changer for those seeking a natural, dewy complexion without the heaviness of a traditional foundation. I use powder foundation often, but it's not as dewy or glowy as this product or a liquid foundation in general. With a lot of my friends saying this is is perfect balance between coverage and comfort, I was eager to put this product to the test.The first thing that struck me about the e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter is its sheer coverage and lightweight finish. It glides onto the skin effortlessly, giving a light wash of color to even out the skin tone. I use concealer to cover up dark marks and my hormonal acne. I love wearing this everyday because of its lightweight formula is a breath of fresh air compared to heavy foundations that can leave your skin feeling suffocated.One of the standout features of this product is its ability to deliver a radiant glow that looks both natural and healthy. It's like capturing the perfect "lit-from-within" look without the need for highlighters, foundation, or a lot of extra products. It's really a one and done! The subtle shimmer in the formula catches the light beautifully, giving your skin a luminous boost that lasts all day.The only downside is the limited shade range. While the e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter is a wonderful option for those with medium-toned skin, it falls short in accommodating individuals with darker or paler complexions. This oversight is disappointing, as makeup should be inclusive and accessible to everyone.In conclusion, the e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter is a fantastic choice for those who want a sheer, lightweight, and radiant finish that's leagues ahead of heavy foundations. It effortlessly achieves a natural and healthy glow that enhances your beauty. However, e.l.f. needs to seriously expand its shade range to cater to a broader spectrum of skin tones, so that everyone can enjoy this glowing sensation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glowing Like a Halo, But I'm No Angel: My Take on e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter
reviews.reviewText: So, I decided to give the e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter a whirl, hoping to turn my skin from "dull daily routine" to "divine radiance". Spoiler alert: I'm now glowing so much, I might start guiding lost ships at sea.First Impressions and Packaging:At first glance, the packaging screams sleek and chic, much like the outfit I’d wear if I ever left my sweatpants.Texture, Application, and Feel:The texture is smoother than my dance moves on a Saturday night. It’s lightweight, and blending it into my skin was easier than my decision to hit snooze every morning. It left my skin feeling like it had just had a spa day – hydrated, happy, and slightly confused about being treated so well.Performance and Wear:This liquid filter promises a glowing, soft-focus effect, and let me tell you, it delivers. I looked in the mirror and thought, “Who is she, and how can I keep her around?” It's like having an Instagram filter in a bottle, minus the digital manipulation and existential crisis.Scent and Ingredients:It's fragrance-free, which is perfect for anyone whose skin throws a tantrum at the slightest whiff of perfume. The ingredient list didn't require me to have a chemistry degree to understand, so that's a plus.Versatility:You can wear it alone, mix it with foundation, or apply it as a highlighter. It's like the Swiss Army knife of makeup, but please don't take it camping.Value for Money:Considering it turns my complexion from "meh" to "miraculous" without requiring a small loan, I'd say it's good value for money.Final Thoughts:Overall, the e.l.f. Halo Glow Liquid Filter is like a magic wand for your face. It gives a natural, radiant glow that says, “I drink enough water and get eight hours of sleep” even if your lifestyle screams the opposite. Highly recommend if you want to look like you're glowing with health, or if you just enjoy pretending you have your life together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Received Shade 1, Not 0
reviews.reviewText: Received the incorrect shade. I already have shade 1, and it's close enough to my skin tone that I don't mind having a second, but I had ordered shade 0. I wanted something lighter for the fact that I'm so pale in the winter.The product itself came in perfect condition, and it's fantastic if you've never used it. Gives a slight shine to the skin, and layers well with other foundations. It's not over the top. Just makes your skin look very hydrated and glowing. It's sheer, not full coverage. I use a matte foundation on areas where I want less shine or need more coverage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on mature skin
reviews.reviewText: Saw about this on social media and thought I'd try it on my mature dry skin. First, using a brush rather than the applicator, it provides a very light cover that brightens my skin after ice applied my moisturizer. All imperfections aren't hidden but I'm not trying to. I then put Elta MD tinted SPF over it and I love how fresh it looks. Second, shade 3.5 is perfect for my skin. I've tried several foundations over the years and never found such a good match. I don't know if I was trying to light of colors but this blends in really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and economical
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a new foundation with light to medium coverage. I tried out the fair/light color and let me tell you, I am floored. I use a similar product from SuperGoop (GlowScreen), but this is a fraction of the cost. The only thing it’s missing is SPF, but I use a different one already underneath, so it’s fine. The coverage is light, but comprehensive. Gently evens out my skin tone, while adding a mild luminescence. I know it’s technically for UNDER makeup, but more make up on top isn’t even necessary. E.l.f. really does a good job with some of their products and the price cannot be beat. For reference, I’m 35 years old. I work outside, and have definitely had my share of sun exposure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this!! Super easy to apply and works perfect . I have worn this without foundation over it because it looks flawless.

I have been using this product for a few weeks now and I am very impressed with the results. It is a lightweight liquid that adds a subtle glow to my skin without looking greasy or glittery. It also hydrates and smooths my skin, thanks to the hyaluronic acid and other nourishing ingredients.I use this product in two ways: as a primer and as a highlighter. As a primer, I apply a thin layer all over my face after moisturizing and before foundation. It gives me a natural-looking radiance that shines through my makeup. It also helps my foundation glide on smoothly and last longer.As a highlighter, I dab a small amount on the high points of my face, such as my cheekbones, brow bones, nose, and cupid's bow. It adds a beautiful dimension and glow to my face without being too obvious or overpowering. It blends easily with my fingers or a sponge and does not disturb my makeup.The product comes in three shades: white gold, rose gold, and golden peach. I have fair skin with cool undertones and I use the white gold shade. It suits my skin tone perfectly and does not look too yellow or pink. The other shades might work better for warmer or deeper skin tones.The packaging is simple but elegant. It is a glass bottle with a pump dispenser and a silver cap. The pump is easy to control and dispenses the right amount of product. The bottle is sturdy and travel-friendly.The price is very reasonable for the quality and quantity of the product. It is $10 for 0.85 oz (25 ml), which is cheaper than many similar products from other brands. It is also vegan and cruelty-free, which is a plus for me.Overall, I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants to add some glow and hydration to their skin. It is versatile, easy to use, and affordable. It is one of my favorite products from e.l.f. and I will definitely repurchase it when I run out.
It arrived before planned. I love this product, the only bad thing is that it’s not possible to choose the shade! So I recieved the lighter one, anyways it goes well with my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My new favourite face product. Not very high coverage but is buildable. Leaves your skin looking plump and youthful with a glow which isn't too shiny/greasy unlike lots of products like this on the market. Price doesn't reflect how good this product is!!
J’ai reçu le produit intact, pas encore essayer, j’ai posé un téléphone pour que vous voyez la taille, je penser personnellement qu’il était plus grand mais cela le va .

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Primer qui n'as rien à envier au fameux Charlotte Tilbury.
reviews.reviewText: J'utilise cette base ELF régulièrement, elle est agréable à l'application et ce travaille comme un charme.Pour toutes celles qui veulent un make-up No makeup.Perso ayant une peau normale et sans imperfections (si l'ont excepte les rides 😉😅53 ans) je l'utilise comme telle.Pour des maquillage plus soutenu je l'utilise en base et applique ensuite le fdt de mon choix.Je recommande cette base ELF sans restrictions aucune.
